## URLTargetingParams type

URLTargetingParams

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type URLTargetingParams = {
    readonly url?: string;
    readonly pattern?: RegExp;
    readonly schemes?: string[];
    readonly hosts?: string[];
    readonly paths?: string[];
};
```

## Example


```json
{
   "schemes": ["https"],
   "hosts": ["neptx.genesislab.global", "neptune-uat2-axes-server2"]
}
```
